sections.heading: Professional Summary
sections.description: I began my career as a Customer Support Exec for a small but busy store in my hometown while I was pursuing my bachelors. Upon completing my bachelors I was hired by Amazon as a Risk Analyst where I continued to monitor transactions and implement AML policies. In the meanwhile I pursued a bootcamp for web development from Perpetual Education. Upon completing my bootcamp, I graduated in Business and Hospitality management diploma program from Canada.I am currently enrolled as an intern for the web developing department in API3.
